entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 4.

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 14.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 90 in the morning then diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 14. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
